elements.title: Goodwin Fire (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that civilian-operated drones twice forced aerial firefighting operations on the Goodwin Fire (pictured) to stop?

elements.title: R. J. Mitchell (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that R. J. Mitchell helped design the Supermarine Spitfire?

elements.title: 2022 Myrtle Beach Bowl (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Marshall ended a three-game bowl losing streak with their win in the 2022 Myrtle Beach Bowl?

elements.title: its 1,000-year-old textile industry (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that hot springs at Aachen nurtured its 1,000-year-old textile industry?

elements.title: Sarah Elmaleh (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that before Sarah Elmaleh voiced the player character in the video game Anthem, developed by BioWare, she voiced characters in a mod of an earlier BioWare game?

elements.title: Loddon Bridge disaster (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Loddon Bridge disaster, which killed three people, led to changes in how falsework was managed on British construction sites?

elements.title: dotations (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that because of dotations made by Napoleon to his supporters, the Kingdom of Westphalia was never fiscally solvent under French rule?

elements.title: Andrew Leake (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Andrew Leake was called "Queen Anne's handsome captain"?
